title: Ingmar Bergman - Djavulens oga / The Devil's Eye - 1960

A Maxless Bergman from 1960 (to me a surprise at least).  With Gunnar BjÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¶rnstrand as host, we visit Hell and accompany a couple of lost souls on their return to the living to corrupt some fairly innocent souls. More of a comedy than your average Bergman fare.

Not as rare as the other Chinese box posts I've upped, but still a "rarity".
Mostly proper subs, though a couple of interesting mix-ups, Pasteur for Pastor and, on occasion, host for guest (at least etymologically related). No signs of Chinglish.
